channel.title: [24/7] BoomScape || PK || 10+ Players 711 || HD Graphics [24/7]
channel.description:
[center]Welcome to BoomScape, we run 24/7, we are a brand new server owned by me and 3 mates, James (me), Olly & Jack.
We currently have around 10+ users online.
We are still in beta mode but we have currently fixed quite a few things like, Nex, drops & Duel Arena!
Website [url=http://boomscape.co.cc]http://boomscape.co.cc[/url]
Web Client [url=http://boomscape.co.cc/client.htm]http://boomscape.co.cc/client.htm[/url]
Downloadable Client [url=http://boomscape.co.cc/boomscape.rar]http://boomscape.co.cc/boomscape.rar[/url]
Features:
Full theiving Full trade Full summoning Pets 100% Nomad 100% Jad Donor & Staff zone Custom quest tab Glacors Armadyl Better pking Added token system, you get from boss's npc etc Slayer Tower Most skills work perfectly now Loads of new shops! Custom yell Added teleports such as ::train ::nomad Player ranks scoreboard Tzhaar 100% Theiving Including stalls and pickpocketing Polypore staff Quick prayers work fully Spell book teleports! Castle wars Spirit shield creation 100% Godsword creations Beast graphics 100% Herblore 100% Crafting 100% lobby DFS Spec works Degrading pvp armors Full nex 100% Castle wars!
[img]http://gyazo.com/d131fd56186b2300738ece0b46bc4f71.png?1339989457[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/5fefe365fd7a0008137393b1cf9e67f8.png?1339989803[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/a8d2bb48df9be00533c6dda32c481a7a.png?1340219182[/img]
I will add more images tomorrow!
Thanks, hope to see you'll around! [/center]

item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I always use x10hosting, so much better.

Unlimited everything, I’ve never had any downtime in 3 years of using them, comes with cPanel 11 and a bunch of scripts already installed, that’s only 6.95$ per month, but the domain costs 10$ per year.

So you have 195$ to purchase a vBulletin license and you don’t have 16$ to purchase a domain and hosting package?
[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @James6213 James6213
item.description:
@James6213 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:4, topic:445656”][quote author=James6213 link=topic=548493.msg4020703#msg4020703 date=1339991204]
What CMS you suggest I use?
[/quote]

Not so much a CMS, I have a few website templates released in the server downloads section, you can search for them and take a look.

As for forums, use SMF or myBB until you get enough money to get vBulletin.[/quote]

I already have vBulletin Licence just haven’t had time to add it to the site yet.
